      • getNbLines

        public int getNbLines()
               throws TechnicalException
        Gets the number of readable lines of current opened file. If a line does not contain 'ID' column of if it is empty, then the line is not taken into account.
        Specified by:
        getNbLines in interface DataInputProvider
        Returns:
        number of opened input file
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (IOException on .sql file) in NoraUi.

      • readValue

        public String readValue(String column,
                        int line)
                 throws TechnicalException
        Reads a cell of opened input file.
        Specified by:
        readValue in interface DataInputProvider
        Parameters:
        column - index of the column to read
        line - index of the line to read
        Returns:
        a String with the value of cell
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (IOException on .sql file) in NoraUi.

      • readLine

        public String[] readLine(int line,
                         boolean readResult)
                  throws TechnicalException
        Specified by:
        readLine in interface DataInputProvider
        Parameters:
        line - id of the line to read (line=0 for reading headers ; line=1 for reading 1st line, ...)
        readResult - true if result must be returned, false otherwise
        Returns:
        all content of read line split by cell in a String array
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (IOException on .sql file) in NoraUi.
